comments.body: hrmm... I wouldn't expect this to be valid

> hrmm... I wouldn't expect this to be valid

Because you expect an empty group to be invalid except for `v1`?  That's a really difficult rule to enforce in Go and we don't do it.  If you want that restriction, I'd suggest future work.
ideally, this should be a valid version, either "v1" or "testgroup/version1". add a TODO to the cleanup list to prevent parsing empty groups like this and cleanup tests like this

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +57,61 @@			version:         &uapi.GroupVersion{Version: "version1"},
			config:          &unversioned.Config{},
			serverVersions:  []string{"/version1", testapi.Default.Version()},
			clientVersions:  []uapi.GroupVersion{{Version: "version1"}, {Version: testapi.Default.Version()}},
			expectedVersion: &uapi.GroupVersion{Version: "version1"},
